title: [vs17.2] Cherrypicking VSBootstrapper task update
body:
Cherrypicking https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/8780

> Fix internal official builds by updating to `MicroBuildBuildVSBootstrapper@3`, which has a fix for some internal VS infrastructure stuff.

commit.message:
MicroBuildBuildVSBootstrapper@3 (#8780)

Fix internal official builds by updating to `MicroBuildBuildVSBootstrapper@3`, which has a fix for some internal VS infrastructure stuff.

nodes.body: Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
